channel.title: [MAP] Flafla2's Black Mesa Fun House!
channel.description:
A little test that I threw together to test out using BM's assets in hammer. It is pretty fun to play around with, too :wink: . Here is a video about it:
[url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rMWC9b_Qs6E']https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rMWC9b_Qs6E[/url]
If you want to download it, you can get it [url='https://www.mediafire.com/?60m0ibhdsfiye8z']here[/url].
Also, there is a bug with the HECU button where when you press it, the button-pressing animation happens with the scientist button, not the HECU one. The HECU still spawn though!
Have fun with the map!

item.title: [MAP] Flafla2's Black Mesa Fun House!
item.dc:creator: Flafla2
item.description:
TehBoxNoob:

Why did’nt you add the mortar and the gargantua and the trainsystem TOW 50.cal etc…

I didn’t add any weapons that you don’t “pick up” and have ammo for, etc., because this is only a first test. I wanted to see how to add basic mechanics.

Read full topic

item.title: [MAP] Flafla2's Black Mesa Fun House!
item.dc:creator: Flafla2
item.description:
A little test that I threw together to test out using BM’s assets in hammer. It is pretty fun to play around with, too . Here is a video about it:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rMWC9b_Qs6E

If you want to download it, you can get it here.

Also, there is a bug with the HECU button where when you press it, the button-pressing animation happens with the scientist button, not the HECU one. The HECU still spawn though!

Have fun with the map!
